tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao.tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai, pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh.####tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai, pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh -> tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai,  pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh . .  Splitting the sentence as the sentence is already divided by a punctuation mark:. tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai, pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh . . Adding the remaining aspect terms to check whether they form sentences:. tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai, pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh . . The aspect term pin forms part of the second sentence. Splitting this along with the conjunction:. tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai,  pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh . . Therefore, the correct splitting is:. tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai!  pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh -> tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai,  pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh . . Hence the sentence is:. tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai,  pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh -> tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai, pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh . . So the correct answer is:. tai nghe khÃ³ káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i mÃ¡y khÃ´ng hiá»ƒu sao. tai nghe mang Ä‘au tai, pin rÃºt hÆ¡i nhanh

Pin trÃ¢u,chÆ¡i game khá»e.hÃ­ hÃ­. Ai thÃ­ch chÆ¡i game vá»›i giÃ¡ má»m mÃ  láº¡i khá»e thÃ¬ mua e nÃ y há»£p lÃ½ nháº¥t####Pin trÃ¢u, chÆ¡i game khá»e. hÃ­ hÃ­. Ai thÃ­ch chÆ¡i game vá»›i giÃ¡ má»m mÃ  láº¡i khá»e thÃ¬ mua e nÃ y há»£p lÃ½ nháº¥t trá»Ÿ thÃ nh: . Pin trÃ¢u, tÃ´i chÆ¡i game khá»e. hÃ­ hÃ­. TÃ´i thÃ­ch chÆ¡i game vá»›i giÃ¡ má»m mÃ  láº¡i khá»e thÃ¬ mua e nÃ y há»£p lÃ½ nháº¥t . splits to: . Pin trÃ¢u, tÃ´i chÆ¡i game khá»e. . hÃ­ hÃ­. . Ai thÃ­ch chÆ¡i game vá»›i giÃ¡ má»m mÃ  láº¡i khá»e thÃ¬ mua e nÃ y há»£p lÃ½ nháº¥t . . STRUCTION FOR SPLITTING: The aspect term 'Pin' and 'game' are close in the sentence so in order to separate it with the subject 'tÃ´i' ('I') we must include the comma after the 'Pin trÃ¢u'. Then, in the original sentence, there was no clear subject so we assign 'tÃ´i' ('I') to both subject positions. Since 'hÃ­ hÃ­' had no clear subject either we assign 'tÃ´i' again but as it is an expression of laughter it can stay as is without any need to assign it an explicit subject and hence stays with the subject from the last sentence 'Ai'. Now the conjunction 'mÃ ' ('but') is to separate two aspects that are to be considered so, 'giÃ¡' will stay with the subject 'Ai'. Since now both of the main aspects, 'chÆ¡i game khá»e' ('playing the game is strong') and 'giÃ¡ má»m' ('cheap price') have been separated, the sentence that includes both of the original sentences is: . Pin trÃ¢u, tÃ´i chÆ¡i game khá»e. . hÃ­ hÃ­. . Ai thÃ­ch chÆ¡i game vá»›i giÃ¡ má»m mÃ  láº¡i khá»e thÃ¬ mua e nÃ y há»£p lÃ½ nháº¥t . . Here the sentence has been formed to follow the requirements in the problem and in natural language Pin trÃ¢u chÆ¡i game khá»e becomes Pin trÃ¢u, tÃ´i chÆ¡i game khá»e to include the subject.

MÃ¡y Sáº¡c Pin mÃ¡y nÃ³ng quÃ¡ hog biáº¿t lÃ  sáº¡c nhanh nÃªn nÃ³ng, hay do lá»—i pháº§n cá»©ng mÃ¡y ná»¯a . . and with correct subject it is . MÃ¡y sÃ i á»•n, . MÃ¡y sÃ i á»•n, . Sáº¡c Pin mÃ¡y nÃ³ng quÃ¡ hog biáº¿t lÃ  sáº¡c nhanh nÃªn nÃ³ng, hay do lá»—i pháº§n cá»©ng mÃ¡y ná»¯a . . The word 'MÃ¡y' is the subject in the first part . However 'MÃ¡y' is also associated with 'Sáº¡c Pin mÃ¡y' . hence it is . MÃ¡y sÃ i á»•n, . MÃ¡y cÃ³ Sáº¡c Pin mÃ¡y nÃ³ng quÃ¡ hog biáº¿t lÃ  sáº¡c nhanh nÃªn nÃ³ng, hay do lá»—i pháº§n cá»©ng mÃ¡y ná»¯a . . However this sentence changes the original sentence . so the subject is actually 'MÃ¡y' and it is common . hence the correct split is . MÃ¡y sÃ i á»•n, . Sáº¡c Pin mÃ¡y nÃ³ng quÃ¡ hog biáº¿t lÃ  sáº¡c nhanh nÃªn nÃ³ng, hay do lá»—i pháº§n cá»©ng mÃ¡y ná»¯a . . However the word 'sao' is a conjunction . hence the correct split is . This way the subject 'MÃ¡y' is common and conjunction 'sao' is also retained . hence this is correct split .
